code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Checkbox,FormControlLabel}from"@material-ui/core";import FilterSlider from"./FilterSliders.js";import{Dropdown,DropdownMenu,DropdownToggle}from"reactstrap";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function FilterBox(props){const[dropdownOpen,setDropdownOpen]=useState(false);const[checkedA,setCheckedA]=React.useState(true);const[checkedB,setCheckedB]=React.useState(true);const dropdownToggle=e=>{setDropdownOpen(!dropdownOpen);};const handleCheckboxChange=name=>event=>{if(name==="checkedA"){setCheckedA(event.target.checked);}else if(name==="checkedB"){setCheckedB(event.target.checked);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Dropdown,{isOpen:dropdownOpen,toggle:dropdownToggle,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DropdownToggle,{caret:true,nav:true,children:"Show Filters"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(DropdownMenu,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"checkboxes",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormControlLabel,{control:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Checkbox,{checked:checkedA,onChange:handleCheckboxChange("checkedA"),name:"checkedA",color:"primary"}),label:"Man"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"checkboxes",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormControlLabel,{control:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Checkbox,{checked:checkedB,onChange:handleCheckboxChange("checkedB"),name:"checkedB",color:"primary"}),label:"Vrouw"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"slider",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FilterSlider,{})})]})]})});}export default FilterBox;
